Hi, I'm Matt Sears. I'm a software developer & entrepreneur in Ohio.

My career spans over 10 years of building small and large scale web applications. My strengths lie not only in the software development and practices of today, but in understanding the complexities of how challenges emerged, and ways in which to manage those challenges in the rapid evolution of today's Web.

I spend most of my days building awesome things at my company Littlelines, a distinguished web development and desgin firm.

Check out more of our work here.
